Package edu.msoe.swe2721.taxRateCalculator

Interface TaxCalculatorInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaxCalculator2023
public interface TaxCalculatorInterface
This interface defines a class that can be used to calculate ones Federal IUncome Taxes based upon filing status and Adjusted Gross Income.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    determineFilingNeed()
    This routine will determine if a tax return is required.
    double
    getAdjustedGrossIncome()
    Obtain the gross income.
    int
    getAge()
    Obtain the age of the filer.
    FilingStatus
    getFilingStatus()
    Obtain the filing status for the tax return.

    getName()
    This method will obtain the name of the tax payer.

    Calculate the net tax rate.

  • Method Details

    • getFilingStatus

      FilingStatus getFilingStatus()
      Obtain the filing status for the tax return.
      Returns:
      The filing status value will be returned.

    • getName

      String getName()
      This method will obtain the name of the tax payer.
      Returns:
      The name of the taxpayer is returned.

    • getSpouseName

      String getSpouseName()
      This method will obtain the name of the spouse.
      Returns:
      The name of the spouse will be returned. If Single or head of household, null will be returned.

    • getAge

      int getAge()
      Obtain the age of the filer. Age must be greater than 0.
      Returns:
      The age of the filer.

    • getSpouseAge

      int getSpouseAge()
      Obtain the age of the spouse. If there is no spouse based on the filing type, a value of 0 will be returned.
      Returns:
      The age of the spouse.

    • setAdjustedGrossIncome

      void setAdjustedGrossIncome(double adjustedGrossIncome) throws TaxFilingException
      This method will set the gross income. The gross income must be greater than or equal to 0. Otherwise, the change will not occur.
      Parameters:
      adjustedGrossIncome - This is the gross income for the taxpayer.
      Throws:
      TaxFilingException - An exception will be thrown if the gross income is negative.

    • getAdjustedGrossIncome

      double getAdjustedGrossIncome()
      Obtain the gross income.
      Returns:
      The gross income will be returned.

    • determineFilingNeed

      boolean determineFilingNeed()
      This routine will determine if a tax return is required. A tax return is required based on income and filing status.
      Returns:
      true will be returned if a tax return is required. False will be returned otherwise.

    • obtainStandardDeduction

      double obtainStandardDeduction()
      Obtain the standard deduction. The standard deduction is based upon filing status and age.
      Returns:
      This method will return the standard deduction.

    • obtainTaxableIncome

      double obtainTaxableIncome()
      Obtain the taxable income. Taxable income is the adjusted gross income (AGI) minus the standard deduction. Taxable income must never be less than 0.
      Returns:
      The taxable income will be returned.

    • getTaxDue

      double getTaxDue()
      Calculate the tax due. Calculation will be based upon IRS tax tables, the filing status, and the standard deduction.
      Returns:
      The tax due will be returned.

    • getNetTaxRate

      double getNetTaxRate()
      Calculate the net tax rate. The net tax rate is defined as the tax due divided by the gross income.
      Returns:
      The net tax rate will be returned. The value is returned as a percent. A value of 1.00 represents 1%. A value of 9.5 represents 9.5%. A value of 0.5 represents 0.5%.
